webscript.description: Gets all nodes deleted by the current user and remain in the archive store. The URL template includes a store_type and a store_id and only nodes which were originally contained within the specified store will be included in the result set.

arg.description: Specifies the username off the user that has deleted items.
Specifies the maximum number of results to return.
Specifies the position in the results to start, used for paging results.
